name: Youtube TWEWY Tsugumi Matsunae, (Hype-chan)
description: It's a Youtube Background of Tsugumi Matsunae (Hype Chan) of "The World Ends with You". If you have any problems like color correction, please send a feedback and i will check this. I have finish all i want to do, now I need to use the style to make next update and the feedback to make some changes.
additional_info: I made some change to the recommandation and the comments box to have something more light, it's the page where people stay the most of time so it need to be more readable. Merry Christmas
